name: Os Paralamas do Sucesso
description: '''Os Paralamas do Sucesso''' (also known simply as '''Paralamas''') is a Brazilian [[Rock music|rock]] band, formed in [[Seropédica]], [[Rio de Janeiro (state)|Rio de Janeiro]], in 1977. Its members since 1982 are [[Herbert Vianna]] (guitar and lead vocals), [[Bi Ribeiro]] (bass), and [[João Barone]] (drums). In its beginning, the band combined [[reggae]] and [[ska]] with rock, but later added horn arrangements and Latin rhythms.
